titles.title: Telephone Excise Tax Repeal Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on telephone and other communications services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. Telephone Excise Tax Repeal Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the excise tax on communication services (i.e., local telephone service, toll telephone service, and teletypewriter exchange service).
